alert.note: Alert for McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 22 at 12:26PM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST/5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST/11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, ground blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...McKenzie County. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 6 AM CST/5 AM MST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, until Noon CST/11 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, making travel dangerous. The life threatening cold will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Avoid outside activities if possible. Do not use generators or grills inside.
